pkgmetadata.longdescription: Different Models of Posterior Distributions of Adjusted Odds Ratio // Generates different posterior distributions of adjusted odds ratio under different priors of sensitivity and specificity, and plots the models for comparison. It also provides estimations for the specifications of the models using diagnostics of exposure status with a non-linear mixed effects model. It implements the methods that are first proposed in doi:10.1016/j.annepidem.2006.04.001 and doi:10.1177/0272989X09353452.
